name: ParaKnight
description:
Welcome, to ParaKnight You play as a brave hero, the last survivor of this world. Their only goal, is to stop the world from eternal darkness and live peacefully, with what is left of it. However, in order to do so, they must retrieve the lost essence of his world by defeating monsters, that mysteriously arrive at night, while also corrupting the world around them. Fighting these monsters can be tough, so on daytime, where no monster is at sight, they must recover. Do you have what it takes to save the world? Remember: Your days are limited.

Controls :

Movement ← → Jump ↓ Attack Z

(This game was made for a Gamejam, decided to upload it here for fun. enjoy :D )
